definitions.explanation_en: A surname of Scottish or Irish origin, commonly found in English-speaking countries; often used to identify individuals or families bearing this name.
definitions.explanation_cn: 苏格兰或爱尔兰起源的姓氏，常见于英语国家，用于指代姓麦吉的个人或家族。
definitions.example_en: Dr. McGee is the lead researcher on the project.
definitions.example_cn: 麦吉博士是该项目的主要研究员。
